mapper.insert: INSERT INTO as_reception ( userId, authorityId, name, phoneNumber, email, postcode, address, detailAddress, facilityType, issueTitle, issueDetails, preferredDateTime ) SELECT m.userId, m.authorityId, #{name}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{postcode}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{facilityType}, #{issueTitle}, #{issueDetails}, #{preferredDateTime} FROM member m WHERE m.userId = #{userId}
